languages.text: "Этого можно было ожидать. Загадке несколько веков, а местные жители очень хорошо умеют потрошить, разбирать и разламывать все, что плохо лежит. Однако сам факт того, что тайник существовал, вселяет в меня надежду! Ведь могут быть и другие".

"It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."
languages.original_text: "Этого можно было ожидать. Загадке несколько веков, а местные жители очень хорошо умеют потрошить, разбирать и разламывать все, что плохо лежит. Однако сам факт того, что тайник существовал, вселяет в меня надежду! Ведь могут быть и другие".

"It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

languages.text: 「やはりそうでしょう。このなぞなぞは数世紀前のもので、地元の者たちは目に留まったものは何でも破壊し、解体してしまう。しかし、宝が存在したという事実そのものが、私に希望を与えてくれでます！他にも宝があるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

traits.locale_text: 「やはりそうでしょう。このなぞなぞは数世紀前のもので、地元の者たちは目に留まったものは何でも破壊し、解体してしまう。しかし、宝が存在したという事実そのものが、私に希望を与えてくれでます！他にも宝があるかもしれません」

languages.text: “这算是意料之中吧。这个谜题已经存在了几百年了，而当地人非常擅长把一切能吸引他们眼球的东西全都掏空、拆解、敲碎。不过，知道藏匿处确实存在，这为我带来了希望！这意味着可能还有其他的藏匿点。”
languages.original_text: "It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

traits.locale_text: “这算是意料之中吧。这个谜题已经存在了几百年了，而当地人非常擅长把一切能吸引他们眼球的东西全都掏空、拆解、敲碎。不过，知道藏匿处确实存在，这为我带来了希望！这意味着可能还有其他的藏匿点。”

languages.text: «Me lo esperaba. El acertijo tiene cientos de años y los lugareños tienen por costumbre desvalijar, desguazar y romper cualquier cosa que les llame la atención. ¡Pero el solo hecho de que haya existido tal escondrijo me da esperanzas! Eso quiere decir que podría haber más».
languages.original_text: "It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

traits.locale_text: «Me lo esperaba. El acertijo tiene cientos de años y los lugareños tienen por costumbre desvalijar, desguazar y romper cualquier cosa que les llame la atención. ¡Pero el solo hecho de que haya existido tal escondrijo me da esperanzas! Eso quiere decir que podría haber más».

languages.text: « Il fallait s'y attendre. Cette énigme a plusieurs siècles et les habitants de la station sont du genre à saccager, piller et briser tout ce qui attire leur attention. Toutefois, le simple fait que cette cachette existe me redonne de l'espoir. Cela signifie qu'il pourrait y en avoir d'autres ! »
languages.original_text: "It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

traits.locale_text: « Il fallait s'y attendre. Cette énigme a plusieurs siècles et les habitants de la station sont du genre à saccager, piller et briser tout ce qui attire leur attention. Toutefois, le simple fait que cette cachette existe me redonne de l'espoir. Cela signifie qu'il pourrait y en avoir d'autres ! »

languages.text: "Das war zu erwarten. Das Rätsel ist mehrere Jahrhunderte alt, und die Einheimischen sind sehr geschickt darin, alles, was ihnen auffällt, auszuschlachten, zu zerlegen und aufzubrechen. Aber schon der Umstand, dass es das Lager überhaupt gab, gibt mir Hoffnung! Das bedeutet, es könnte auch andere geben."
languages.original_text: "It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

traits.locale_text: "Das war zu erwarten. Das Rätsel ist mehrere Jahrhunderte alt, und die Einheimischen sind sehr geschickt darin, alles, was ihnen auffällt, auszuschlachten, zu zerlegen und aufzubrechen. Aber schon der Umstand, dass es das Lager überhaupt gab, gibt mir Hoffnung! Das bedeutet, es könnte auch andere geben."

languages.text: "Şaşırdım diyemem. Bulmaca birkaç asırlık ve yöre sakinleri de gözlerine ilişen her şeyi deşmek, sökmek ve yıkmakta uzmanlaşmış. Yine de zulanın varlığı bile bana umut verdi! Demek ki başka zulalar da olabilir."
languages.original_text: "It was to be expected. The puzzle is several centuries old, and the locals are quite adept at gutting, dismantling, and breaking anything that catches their eye. But the very fact that the cache ever existed gives me hope! It means that there could be others."

traits.locale_text: "O kadarı doğal. Bu bulmaca yüzlerce yıllık ve Binliman halkı da gözlerine ilişen her şeyi sökmek, demonte etmek ve yıkmakta epey becerikli. Öte yandan, zulanın varlığı bile bana umut verdi! Demek ki başka zulalar da olabilir."
